<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
    const {java} = this;
    let $ = JSON.parse(url).data;
    let arr = [];
    if ($.book_shelf_info && $.book_shelf_info.length > 0) {
        arr = $.book_shelf_info.map(item => item.book_id);
    } else if ($.data_list && $.data_list.length > 0) {
        arr = $.data_list.map(item => item.book_id_str);
    } else {
        java.toast("è·å– book_id å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½ å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦ç™»å½•ï¼");
    }
    return arr;
}

let session = getSessionId()

getShelf = () => {
    let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(getServerHost() + "/book_shelf?session=" + session)
    
    bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
    
    let id_list = splitArray(bid, 200)
    let urls = []
    id_list.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getServerHost() +"/detail?book_id=" + i.join(",") + "&sessionid=" + session)
    })
    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
    let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(getServerHost() +"/book_shelf?session=" + session))
    
    let group_bookids = {
        "æœªåˆ†ç»„": []
    }
    book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
        if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
        group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"].push(i.book_id)
    })
    
    if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
    
    let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 200)
    let urls = []

    book_ids.forEach(i => { 	urls.push("https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=" + i.join(","))
    })
    
    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
    let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
        "bookmall/tab",
        "version_name=5.8.9.32",
        null,
        "sessionid=" + session
    )
    let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
    let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
    if (!tab) tab = []
    let bookList = []
    for (let i of tab) {
        bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    }
    return { book_info: bookList }
}

function normalizeResponse(data) {
    if (data.book_info) return data.book_info;
    if (data.data && data.data.book_info) return data.data.book_info;
    if (data.data && Array.isArray(data.data)) return data.data;
    if (data.list) return data.list;
    if (data.book_list) return data.book_list;
    if (data.data && data.data.publication_list) return data.data.publication_list;
    if (data.result) return data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.result) return data.data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.cell_view && data.data.cell_view.book_data) {
        return data.data.cell_view.book_data;
    }
    if (data.data && data.data.records) return data.data.records;
    if (data.data && data.data.list) return data.data.list;
    return [];
}

if (baseUrl.includes("type_style")) {
    let sortKey = getSortKey();
    if (sortKey && sortKey !== "") {
        let newUrl = baseUrl.replace(/selected_items=[^&]*/, `selected_items=${sortKey}`);
        if (!newUrl.includes("selected_items=")) {
            if (newUrl.includes("?")) {
                newUrl += `&selected_items=${sortKey}`;
            } else {
                newUrl += `?selected_items=${sortKey}`;
            }
        }
        result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(newUrl));
    } else {
        result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(baseUrl));
    }
    
    let normalizedData = normalizeResponse(result);
    JSON.stringify({data: normalizedData});
} else if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) {
    result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
} else if(/read_history/.test(baseUrl)) {
    let pageMatch = baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/);
    let page = pageMatch ? pageMatch[1] : '1';
    
    let history_response = java.ajax(getServerHost() + "/read_history?session=" + session + "&page=" + page)
    let history_data = JSON.parse(history_response)
    
    if (history_data.data && history_data.data.data_list) {
        let book_ids = history_data.data.data_list.map(item => item.book_id_str)
        
        let id_list = splitArray(book_ids, 200)
        let urls = []
        id_list.forEach(i => {
            urls.push("https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=" + i.join(","))
        })
        
        let resp = {book_info: []}
        urls.forEach(url => {
            let detailResponse = java.ajax(url)
            let detailData = JSON.parse(detailResponse)
            if (detailData.data) {
                resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(detailData.data)
            }
        })
        
        result = resp
    } else {
        result = {book_info: []}
    }
} else {
    let w = baseUrl.split("/")
    if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
        result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
    } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
        result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
    } else {
        result = JSON.parse(result)
        if (result.data && result.data.data) {
            result = {book_info: result.data.data}
        }
    }
}

if (!baseUrl.includes("jjbookshelf") && !baseUrl.includes("type_style")) {
    let normalizedData = normalizeResponse(result);
    JSON.stringify({data: normalizedData})
}
</js>

  content = content.replace(/<i class="icon icon-uni(.{4})"><\/i>/g, (_, p1) => String.fromCharCode(parseInt(p1, 16)));

  return Array.from(content, char => {
    const code = char.charCodeAt(0)
    if (code >= 0xE001 && code <= 0xE101) {
      return replacementChars[code - 0xE001]
    } else {
      return char
    }
  }).join('')
}
replace(result)
